entries.entry: We learned about 4 different array methods today. forEach made sense, but the others still confuse me.

We learned about 4 different ways to write functions today. They all made sense for the most part, however I will need to become more accustomed to the various forms of syntax and how/when to use each one appropriately
We got our first look at utilizing APIs and JSON Servers. It was quite a bit to take in, but conceptually made sense. We also got our first look at Postman!
